name: Anzu Line Bot
description: A LINE chatbot to schedule and remind you of your tasks

ADMIN_USER_ID.description: Your LINE user ID (not LINE ID) to act as an administrator

CHANNEL_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Your LINE Developers Account API Key to act as the conduit

CHANNEL_SECRET.desciption: Your LINE Developers Account Secret Key to authorize yourself

DATABASE.description: Your MongoDB connection string. Make sure to NOT expose the password in this connection string (but fill your username and the database name) (format: mongodbserver://<YOUR_USERNAME>:<PASSWORD>mongodbstring/<YOUR_DATABASE>?mongodbstring)
